mapper.select: select e.*,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id order by emp_id asc

select e.*,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where e.emp_id = #{id} order by emp_id asc

select e.*,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where e.city_id = #{cityId} order by emp_id asc

select e.*,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where e.store_id = #{storeId} AND e.identity_type='SELLER' order by emp_id asc
select DISTINCT e.identity_type from emp_employee e WHERE e.store_id=#{id} order by emp_id asc

select e.*,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where e.store_id = #{storeId} order by emp_id asc

select e.*,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where e.store_id = #{storeId} AND e.identity_type=#{identityType} order by emp_id asc

select e.*,c.city_id,c.name cname,s.store_id,s.store_name from emp_employee e LEFT JOIN city c on e.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN st_store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id where e.name LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryEmpInfo},'%') OR e.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryEmpInfo},'%') OR e.login_name LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{queryEmpInfo},'%') order by emp_id asc
